header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines an algorithm that repeats a user-specified target for each element in a .

macro.abstract: The macro repeats the target specified by its first argument for each element in its second argument.

param.para:
The target that is to be repeated for each element in g. This target must be either a or a macro name that refers to a macro with a signature compatible with the following pseudo-signature:
macro(s, elem†)

† If the type of g is non-variadic, elem must be ... or the number of parameters that corresponds to the number of sub-elements in each element of g. Otherwise, elem must be ... or a single parameter.

usage.param: The for which macro is to be repeated for each element.

macro(s, elem†, data‡)

‡ The data pseudo-parameter must be either ... or the number of parameters that corresponds to the number of arguments in the auxiliary data, __VA_ARGS__.
